name: Brath: Brain and Math
description: Several very challenging small Math/Memory games made on Unreal Engine 4. Its bassically inovated classic concentration game and one math board game. If you want to test your concentration skills or give your brain an exercise, Brath game is here for you with some fresh new mechanics.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher Storage: 200 MB available space
